item.description:
Please Note this month's healing will be held at Udderly Woolly Acres in Glastonbury - located at 851 Thompson Street! In the event of rain we will meet the the Growing Green Co-op!

Join us before the healing for a Wild Weed Walk with helpful gardener Scott Reill and Roots founder Lindsay Roepelle as they co-lead a wild weed walk around the soon to be Alchemy Acres farm located at 581 Thompson Street in Glastonbury from 4-6 pm on Sunday, June 6th. Learn about nutrient dense real food, the power of wild edibles our plans to turn the farm into a community educational center. The walk will be followed by a full body gong healing with the CONDUIT @ 6pm. Come experience the power of vibrational healing! (www.gongtheplent.com). $25 donation to go towards the purchase of the farm! For more information about the farm, nutrient dense food or the co-op, go to www.alchemyacres.com


Vibrational healing through sound can be traced back to ancient civilizations and is used all over the world. This Sunday (and every first Sunday of the month), The Conduit performs a sound healing meditation which incorporates the use of planetary gongs & Tibetan singing bowls. Feeling the synergistic nature of vibration can open our minds to higher possibilities and states of harmony, ultimately resulting in self-healing. Shifting the themes each month keep us in touch with the energies of the world and life around us.

Gathering people together for sharing a harmonic musical experience can be powerful. Something uplifting happens when we come together to create a sense of community through sound healing. Join us as we reconnect our hearts and bring love to our planet through the transformational power of vibration.

Using sound as a healing modality, a Conduit sound healing session clears and aligns the energy centers to promote deep relaxation & renewal. In meditation, we will unify with our essence, our original self, by hearing vibratory sounds that produce a quieting influence on the mind and body.

Join The Conduit and others as we meditate and connect with the sacredness of the universe through sound and vibration. A $20 donation goes to support the work of The Conduit and the Growing Green Co-op's healing arts space.

To learn more about The Conduit, please see www.GongThePlanet.com or www.TheConduitCenter.com.
item.name: A Guided Transformational Meditation Concert
